name: email-mcp
description: Read, search, send, and manage emails via IMAP and SMTP. Works with any email provider â€” Gmail, Outlook, Fastmail, and more.
long_description: A general-purpose email integration for Claude. Connect any IMAP/SMTP-compatible email account and give Claude the ability to check your inbox, search messages, compose and send emails, and organize your mailbox. Supports SSL, STARTTLS, and unencrypted connections with configurable ports and credentials.

email_address.title: Email Address
email_address.description: Your email address (also used as the From address and default username)

email_password.title: Password / App Password
email_password.description: Your email password or app-specific password. For Gmail, use an App Password from https://myaccount.google.com/apppasswords

imap_host.title: IMAP Host
imap_host.description: IMAP server hostname (e.g. imap.gmail.com, outlook.office365.com, imap.fastmail.com)

smtp_host.title: SMTP Host
smtp_host.description: SMTP server hostname (e.g. smtp.gmail.com, smtp.office365.com, smtp.fastmail.com)

imap_security.title: IMAP Security
imap_security.description: IMAP connection security: ssl (port 993), starttls (port 143), or none

smtp_security.title: SMTP Security
smtp_security.description: SMTP connection security: ssl (port 465), starttls (port 587), or none (port 25)

imap_port.title: IMAP Port
imap_port.description: Custom IMAP port (leave empty for default based on security mode)

smtp_port.title: SMTP Port
smtp_port.description: Custom SMTP port (leave empty for default based on security mode)

email_username.title: Username (if different from email)
email_username.description: IMAP/SMTP login username, if different from your email address. Leave empty to use the email address.

ssl_verify.title: Verify SSL Certificates
ssl_verify.description: Set to 'false' to skip TLS certificate verification (not recommended)

tools.name: list_mailboxes
tools.description: List available mailboxes/folders (INBOX, Sent, Drafts, Archive, Trash, etc.)

tools.name: list_emails
tools.description: List emails in a mailbox with pagination, newest first

tools.name: fetch_email
tools.description: Fetch a single email by UID with full body and attachment info

tools.name: search_emails
tools.description: Search emails by sender, recipient, subject, body, date range, or read/unread status

tools.name: send_email
tools.description: Compose and send an email via SMTP with support for CC, BCC, reply-to, and HTML

tools.name: move_email
tools.description: Move an email to another folder (e.g. Archive, Trash, Junk)
